text: Yet another basic, ordinary, boring day.
You wish you were a cat.
But life isn't always sunshine and lolipops.
Wait... You see that?
A KITTYYYY!!!! AAAAAHHHH!!
What a cute kitty.
"Meow"
"Nyan, Hello there"
"Yes, I'm a talking cat."
What? A talking cat? That's an Easter miracle!
Forget about Jesus and eggs. This is way cooler.
"Mreow. Yeah I guess I'm way cooler."
"Anyway I've got some stuff to do in the cat realm."
"You know, saving the day and other stuff. And I could really use some help"
"Would you like to become a cat for a day and help me?"
"Meow? Really? I guess I judged you wrong."
"I thought you were cool. Goodnyan I guess."
You're so boring...
You've got talking cat and you didn't even care to go on adventure smh
That's it. That's your bad ending bro
And that's how your adventure starts.
"I'm Jelly by the way. What your cat name will be?"
You pick name Puffy. It's cute and round like you.
You both go into the trash bin.
It's smelly in here. You are guided by Jelly's voice.
You are going through all the trash. In the dark you see something shining next to you.
Would you like to pick it up?
You try to pick it up
Just as you touch strange thing with your whiskers. The light starts pulsating
"MREOW. What are you doing?! That's a very secret, very powerful cube that can end the world"
Just as Jelly says this, the world explodes.
Well...
Nice adventure though
You try to pick up the cube
And you succeed.
